contest-event.event-date:
May 12, 1945 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - Dysart Colliery. Best section 3 band - Shotts R.C. Best section 4 band - Winchburgh H.G. Hymn tune 1st Bathgate, 2nd Wellesley, 3rd Shotts. Deportment 1st Tullis Russell, 2nd Winchburgh, 3rd Bathgate. 13 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 3:37 p.m. June 8, 2018, 7:35 a.m.
1 Wellesley Colliery Band Thomas Proctor
2 Shotts St Patrick's Brass John Faulds
3 Bathgate Band J. Riley
4 Tullis Russell Mills John Haldane
5 Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds
6 Clydebank Burgh Band George Hawkins
Unknown Result Bellshill & District Concert Brass Unknown
